question: Oh no! Your ball went down a rabbit hole and you have to take a drop from knee height. What are you NOT allowed to do? *

choices.text: Aim at a place on the ground

explanation: When dropping a ball from knee height You are allowed to attempt to drop it into a particular spot on the ground as long as it does not hit your foot and does not end up closer to the hole. You cannot spin the ball with your fingers as you drop it
